name: 暴走熊孩
description:
♞ About this game
  • Your name is Danting. One fateful night, you were snatched away by some kind of mystical power, and finally abandoned in the Nameless Land. What a poor kid! To find your way home, the only thing you can trust is to take the best advantage of the environment and props. The very day you arrive in the Cave of Doom, you'll confront the ultimate enemy. Devils and beasts have been unleashed, and time can’t be wasted anymore! Start right now and seek the answer before it's too late!
  • As you can preview, this game involves some cool features, such as action, adventure, rogue-like and other RPG features. By immersing yourself in the game, you might experience the adventures, build a town, gather resources, upgrade technologies, and even recruit new heroes. And beyond that, during your adventures you can also explore new areas, accomplish tasks and achievements. Finally, it is interesting to mention the distinct NPCs, diverse landscape, unique monsters and all sorts of unexpected in-game events. All in all, there'll be tons of fancy features to find out, which require patience, too. Then, take some time to explore and reveal the truth!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------★ Key Features
  • Diverse landscape, including the wilderness, relic, snow , desert, tribes and cave. Excitingly, there is more coming soon.
  • Brilliant design of randomized maps! Create a new world at any time and no worries about boring repeating patterns. In addition, there're lots of unmentioned random elements and traps, too.
  • Over 100 fascinating props. Every of them, distinct and significant. Gather them and get ready for all challenge! You can do almost everything with them!
  • Over 80 monsters, driven by surprisingly smarter and tricky AI!
  • Fierce and cruel BOSS fight! More than 20 powerful Boss with unique behaviors and skills! you'd better believe they will shake everything!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------✍ Other Features
  • Over 7 heroes with unique capacities. Recruit them and explore in different ways!
  • Avatars with 11 different body parts. Tough, or Hip-hop Just dress up as you please.
  • Over 15 adorable pets. Choose your favorite one and pull together during the journey.
  • Mystery Rooms may be found unexpectedly. Keep your eyes open and look where you are going!
  • Upgrade technology for combat capabilities, pets and other general abilities. You can experience the maximum of ability growth.
  • Over 200 achievements for more play time! But I wonder if you can achieve all the goals.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------☂ Shape the game with us
  • As you can see，still there are some details to optimize in this preview version. Our team is focusing on the optimization with great passion and motivation. And we trust the process. We can guarantee that great attention will be paid to those constructive feedbacks.
  • Thank you again for your attention and suggest. We sincerely look forward to better works just like you do.
